verses.roman:
ekānta-bhāve āśriyāchena caitanya-caraṇa
madhye madhye prabhura teṅho karena nimantraṇa

synonyms: ekānta-bhāve—with full attention; āśriyāchena—has taken shelter of; caitanya-caraṇa—the lotus feet of Lord Caitanya; madhye madhye—sometimes; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; teṅho—he; karena—does; nimantraṇa—invitation.
translation: He sought the shelter of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu with full surrender. Sometimes he would invite the Lord to dine at his home.
